content: dragonflymomof2 designs © october love aurora suominen copyright ©9­2013 all rights reserved h hook & worsted weight yarn for abbreviations/videos/links see dragonflymomof2 designs at http //myblueangels blogspot com/ notes bolded print repeat in pattern sts =stitches any st or chsps bpsc & fptc sts are worked around the post of next st video showing round 9 can be seen at http //www youtube com/watch v=qupispproji round 1 ch4 work 15dc in 4th chain from hook join in top of beg ch4 16dc round 2 ch3 4dc in same st +ch1 skip one double_crochet single_crochet in next double_crochet ch1 skip one double_crochet+ 5dc in next double_crochet 3x repeat +to+ once & join in top of beg ch3 20dc 4sc round 3 ch3 +2dc in next 3 double_crochet double_crochet in next double_crochet single_crochet in 3 sts + double_crochet in next double_crochet 3x repeat +to+once join 32dc 12sc round 4 ch3 double_crochet in next double_crochet +2dc in next 4 double_crochet double_crochet in next 2 double_crochet ch1 skip single_crochet single_crochet in single_crochet ch1 skip single_crochet+ double_crochet in next 2 double_crochet 3x repeat +to+ once join 48dc 4sc round 5 ch3 double_crochet in next 3 double_crochet +2dc in next 4 double_crochet double_crochet in next 4 double_crochet single_crochet in 3 sts + double_crochet in next 4 double_crochet 3x repeat +to+ once join 64dc 12sc round 6 ch3 double_crochet in next 5 double_crochet +2dc in next 4 double_crochet double_crochet in next 6 double_crochet ch1 skip single_crochet single_crochet in single_crochet ch1 skip dragonflymomof2 designs© support email bluedragonflymom@gmail com october love © page1 single_crochet + double_crochet in next 6dc 3x repeat +to+ once join 80dc 4sc round 7 ch1 bpsc in joining st bpsc in 19dc ch1 skip 3sts bpsc in 20dc 3x ch1 skip 3sts & join in 1st single_crochet fasten_off color 1 80sc round 8 counting your joining st count 10dc and join your new color w/slip_stitch in the 11th single_crochet and work ch3 double_crochet ch1 2dc beg corner made double_crochet in 9sc 2dc in space double_crochet in 10sc in next single_crochet work corner of 2dc ch1 2dc 4x minus last corner join 100dc slip_stitch over to corner ch1sp *try to fptc loosely this will hopefully minimize the rippling depending on your yarn round 9 beg corner double_crochet in next 3dc fptc in the 3rd double_crochet of round 8 to the right of your work 8x *see video link if needed double_crochet in next double_crochet corner in next space 4x minus last corner & join 148sts slip_stitch over to ch1sp round 10 beg corner ch1 skip a st double_crochet 18x ch1 skip st work corner in space 4x minus last corner & join fastening off color 2 88dc round 11 with color 1 join in corner ch1sp & beg corner double_crochet in 2sts staying behind your work tc in skipped st of round 9 double_crochet in next double_crochet 19x double_crochet in next st corner in next space 4x minus last corner & join fasten_off & weave in your ends 180dc you might need to block your square
